/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. From the vantage point of a car on the road, the viewer's gaze is drawn down the length of the street, flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the overcast sky, their monotone palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and blue. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, their colors muted under the gray sky. The perspective of the image, taken from inside a car, adds a sense of immediacy and immersion, as if the viewer is right there on the busy street of Beijing.
